data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Sochi get the game underway.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Arnor Sigurdsson scores to make it 1-0 at VEB Arena.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
In the minute 9, Sochi have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Free kick CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 11, Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Sochi.
Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Sochi.
Sochi have a goal kick.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 14, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Sochi.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
In the minute 15, CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sochi at VEB Arena.
Sochi have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 17, Free kick for CSKA Moscow in the half of Sochi.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Sochi attack but Anton Zabolotnyi's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 19, Evgeniy Kukulyak awards CSKA Moscow a goal kick.
Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Sochi.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Sochi.
Nikola Vlasic of CSKA Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Sochi at VEB Arena.
In the minute 22, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Sochi to take a throw-in in CSKA Moscow territory.
Nikita Burmistrov gets an equalizer for Sochi. The score is now 1-1.
In the minute 23, Great play from Timofey Margasov to set up the goal.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Sochi's half.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
In the minute 25, CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sochi advance rapidly upfield but Evgeniy Kukulyak blows for offside.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Joaozinho (Sochi) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 34, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Sochi.
Sochi surge into the attack at VEB Arena but Ivan Miladinovicâ€™s header is off-target.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards CSKA Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 38, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Sochi's Sergey Terekhov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 41, It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Sochi.
In the minute 44, Anton Zabolotnyi (Sochi) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by CSKA Moscow defenders.
Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Ball goes out of play for a CSKA Moscow goal kick.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, CSKA Moscow have kicked-off the second half at VEB Arena.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Sochi's half.
Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 50, CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 52, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Sochi's half.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Sochi.
Free kick for Sochi in the half of CSKA Moscow.
CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Sochi's Anton Zabolotnyi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a CSKA Moscow defender.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Throw-in for Sochi close to the penalty box.
In the minute 59, Anton Zabolotnyi of Sochi smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 61, Evgeniy Kukulyak awards the away team a throw-in.
Sochi are pushing forward but Nikita Burmistrov's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a CSKA Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 63, Sochi's Anton Zabolotnyi misses with an attempt on goal.
CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sochi at VEB Arena.
In the minute 64, Viktor Goncharenko (CSKA Moscow) is making a first substitution, with Chidera Ejuke replacing Nayair Tiknizyan.
Kristijan Bistrovic is replacing Georgi Schennikov for the home team.
CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 66, Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for CSKA Moscow in Moscow.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Konstantin Maradishvili (CSKA Moscow) has received a yellow card from Evgeniy Kukulyak.
Viktor Goncharenko is making the team's third substitution at VEB Arena with Ilzat Akhmetov replacing Arnor Sigurdsson.
In the minute 69, The home team have replaced Fedor Chalov with Adolfo Gaich. This is the fourth substitution made today by Viktor Goncharenko.
Can CSKA Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sochi's half?
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
In the minute 71, Sochi needs to be cautious. CSKA Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ilzat Akhmetov (CSKA Moscow) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Sochi.
Throw-in CSKA Moscow.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Sochi.
In the minute 74, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a throw-in for Sochi, close to CSKA Moscow's area.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards Sochi a goal kick.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 76, CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
In the minute 79, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Artur Yusupov (Sochi) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
The away team replace Nikita Burmistrov with Danyl Prutsev.
In the minute 82, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Sochi to take a throw-in in CSKA Moscow territory.
Throw-in Sochi.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
In the minute 83, Marko Dugandzic is replacing Anton Zabolotnyi for Sochi at VEB Arena.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 85, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Sochi's half.
Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
CSKA Moscow pushes forward through Nikola Vlasic, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 88, CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
Sochi needs to be cautious. CSKA Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 89, Goal kick for Sochi at VEB Arena.
At VEB Arena the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Sergey Terekhov for the away team is judged to be offside.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
In Moscow CSKA Moscow drive forward through Chidera Ejuke. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Evgeniy Kukulyak blows against CSKA Moscow's Adolfo Gaich for offside.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
At VEB Arena, Adolfo Gaich has been yellow-carded for the home team.
